<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== Target Policy: "OTK id_token Generation" when id_token_signing_algorithm is not HS256"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="=== This policy is used by OTK id_token Generation when id_token_signing_algorithm=RS256"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="=== It uses the default SSL key found on the gateway"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${append}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:EncodeJsonWebToken>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// add header 'kid'"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:EncryptionSourceType intValue="2"/>
                    <L7p:HeaderAction stringValue="Merge to Generated Header"/>
                    <L7p:KeyGoid goidValue="0000000000000000ffffffffffffffff"/>
                    <L7p:SignPayload booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:SignatureAlgorithm stringValue="RS256"/>
                    <L7p:SignatureSourceType intValue="1"/>
                    <L7p:SourceHeaders stringValue="${kid_header}"/>
                    <L7p:SourceVariable stringValue="${idtoken}"/>
                    <L7p:TargetVariable stringValue="jwt"/>
                </L7p:EncodeJsonWebToken>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// default "/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${append}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:Regex>
                    <L7p:AutoTarget booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="append"/>
                    <L7p:Regex stringValue="}$"/>
                    <L7p:Replace booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Replacement stringValue=","kid":"${kid}"}"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                </L7p:Regex>
                <L7p:EncodeJsonWebToken>
                    <L7p:EncryptionSourceType intValue="2"/>
                    <L7p:HeaderAction stringValue="Merge to Generated Header"/>
                    <L7p:KeyGoid goidValue="0000000000000000ffffffffffffffff"/>
                    <L7p:SignPayload booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:SignatureAlgorithm stringValue="RS256"/>
                    <L7p:SignatureSourceType intValue="1"/>
                    <L7p:SourceHeaders stringValue="${append}"/>
                    <L7p:SourceVariable stringValue="${idtoken}"/>
                    <L7p:TargetVariable stringValue="jwt"/>
                </L7p:EncodeJsonWebToken>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// Append third party sso token to JWT header"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:Detail stringValue="The JWT could not be created"/>
                </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTIy"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="error"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// generate signed JWT"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// the shared secret actually is the name of the key that was used for signing the token"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtraWR9"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="shared_secret"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:ExportVariables>
            <L7p:ExportedVars stringArrayValue="included">
                <L7p:item stringValue="error.code"/>
                <L7p:item stringValue="jwt.compact"/>
                <L7p:item stringValue="shared_secret"/>
            </L7p:ExportedVars>
        </L7p:ExportVariables>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
